ygData.subject: RE: Zones zones Zones
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hrm - according to the screen shots, it s a wind instrument with a greater lightstone effect and nothing more.  Are you sure about the purge effect?  Not
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:00 PM 12/2/99 -0800, you wrote:
>From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
>The unicorn in Lesser Faydark is Equestrielle. We killed it once and I got a
>Unicorn Horn. It's a wind instrument with 5 charges of Purge. It hits for
>100+, not sure what level it is though.

Hrm - according to the screen shots, it's a wind instrument with a greater
lightstone effect and nothing more. Are you sure about the purge
effect? Not to be like questionable or nothing.... I've been asking for
help compiling the magical instrument list, and no one seems willing to
provide any. *harrumph*

Talies
